import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { RegisterComponent } from '../register/register.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage', templateUrl: './homepage.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage.component.css'] }) export class HomepageComponent { title = 'first-product'; constructor(private modalService: NgbModal) { } // Method to open the registration form as a popups openRegistrationModal() { const modalRef = this.modalService.open(RegisterComponent); modalRef.componentInstance.name = 'Register'; } } HOME-PAGE
